LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
• Only registered customers (see list below) with a public and a secret key for the API have access to it.
  • You can remove the access for a customer permanently by deleting the keys or temporary by deactivating them.
  • The rights of the respective customer group are valid for the API too.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiOdataUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the OData Web API.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiOdataMetadataUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the OData metadata. It describes the complete entity data model (EDM) the Web API is based on.

LocaleResource.Name: ValidMinutePeriod.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: For security reasons should the time at which the request was sent to the API differ not too far from the current server time. With this setting, you set this time window in minutes.

LocaleResource.Name: LogUnauthorized.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Each unauthorized access will be saved in the log list.

LocaleResource.Name: NoRequestTimestampValidation.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to validate that the timestamp of the previous request is less or equal than the one of the current. Prevents the occurrence of HmacResult.TimestampOlderThanLastRequest.

LocaleResource.Name: AllowEmptyMd5Hash.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to allow authentifications without MD5 content hash.
